recipe.title: Ham & Cheese Cucumber “Sushi” Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 slices ; all-natural deli meat, of your choice, thinly sliced
⅓ cup ; carrot, cut into matchsticks ; (35 g)

steps.step: Slice cucumber into large 1-inch (2 ½ cm) thick slices.
Hollow out center of cucumber, leaving about ½ inch (1 cm) of cucumber inside.
Roll deli meat strips into a small roll.
Stuff cucumber pieces with deli meat, cheese, and carrots until center is filled.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Slice cucumber into large 1-inch (2 ½ cm) thick slices.
Hollow out center of cucumber, leaving about ½ inch (1 cm) of cucumber inside.
Roll deli meat strips into a small roll.
Stuff cucumber pieces with deli meat, cheese, and carrots until center is filled.
